8.title: National Treasure
8.plot: Dr. Paul Bearer 2 hosts "National Treasure" on Tombstone Tales. Dr. Paul shows off his treasures, a tea cup from the Boston Tea Party which he drops and shatters and other vintage memorabilia. He also discusses his family history, when his great great grandfather signed the declaration of Sindependence.

9.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
9.plot: Dr. Paul Bearer 2 hosts "National Treasure: Book of Secrets" on Tombstone Tales. Dr. Paul reads excerpt from John Wilkes Booth's original diary. The show is sponsored by Slays Potato Chips, Mold Spice and Mean Cuisine.

1.title: The Haunted Mansion - Valentine
1.plot: Dr. Paul Bearer 2 hosts "The Haunted Mansion" on Tombstone Tales. The antics include Dr. Paul going through bills to find an American AXEpress card which he hopes will cut his bills in half. The second movie being hosted is "Valentine". In this episode, Dr. Paul is lurking for love in all the wrong places with his Eek Harmony profile. Dr. Paul stated, "I'm not looking for a down to earth girl, I'm looking for one IN the earth!"

4.title: 4 Max Payne
4.plot: Dr. Paul Bearer 2 hosts "Max Payne" on Tombstone Tales. In this episode, Dr. Paul receives a delivery from the Antique of the Month Club. When Dr. Paul opens the box it is Tampa radio legend Jack Harris who tells Dr. Paul, "I like to make sure my fans don't have any DEAD air."

5.title: Kill Bill Vol. 2
5.plot: Dr. Paul thanks his sponsors Killadelphia Scream Cheeses, Zephyrkills Water, and Betty Croaker Au Rotten Potatoes.

6.title: Mirrors
6.plot: Dr. Paul Bearer 2 hosts "Mirrors" on Tombstone Tales. The antics include Dr. Paul talking to the mirror on the wall, in the mirror can be seen Paul Worth Barrington who is in reality Dr. Paul Bearer 2 out of makeup and costume. Dr. Paul also shows magazine covers he has been on such as, Entertombment Weekly, Vanity Scare, and Haunted Housekeeping.

7.title: Hide and Seek
7.plot: Dr. Paul Bearer 2 hosts "Hide and Seek" on Tombstone Tales. The antics include Dr. Paul hosting a Halloween party which finds local celebrities Dave and Veronica from QYK showing up trick-or-treating at Dr. Paul's door. Dr. Paul puts treats in their bag, a heart and a brain.
